short_description: This building block processes (reshapes and scales) gene expression data from the [Genomics of Drug Sensitivity in Cancer (GDSC) database](https://www.cancerrxgene.org/) for use by other building blocks.
long_description: This building block processes (reshapes and scales) gene expression data from the [Genomics of Drug Sensitivity in Cancer (GDSC) database](https://www.cancerrxgene.org/) for use by other building blocks.

default.name: input_file
default.description: csv with the GDSC gene expression data

default.name: col_genes
default.description: Name of the column containing the gene symbols (e.g. GENE_SYMBOLS)

default.name: exclude_cols
default.description: Exclude columns containing the given string (e.g. GENE_title)

default.name: tsv
default.description: Import as TSV instead of CSV (TRUE | FALSE)

default.name: remove
default.description: Remove the given substring from columns (e.g. .DATA)
